Latently | Deep Learning Engineer | Boulder, Co | REMOTE

Latently is a stealth-mode pre-revenue startup that is looking for engineers who want to earn sweat equity alongside the founders. We have substantial hardware support through IBM's Global Entrepreneur program and you'll be training state-of-the-art recurrent neural networks on unstructured text on a sweet GPU cluster. If you have the luxury of time this is a great opportunity. Send resumes to brian@latent.ly
